content: this beautiful moss stitch crochet dishcloth works up so quickly and makes a great housewarming gift the soft yarn and smooth stitches mean this dishcloth also works well as a washcloth this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy finished size approximately 8 75 x 8 75 hook size us size g/6 4 0 yarn category 4 worsted weight main stitches single_crochet chain slip_stitch the pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on https //www stitching-together com/moss-stitch-crochet-dishcloth/ 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy-to-read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 https //www stitching-together com/moss-stitch-crochet-dishcloth/
